projects.name: Voting App
projects.description: Developed a RESTful backend with role-based access control using JWT authentication and bcrypt password hashing. Enabled users to vote only once and view real-time voting results. Implemented secure admin features to manage candidates and restrict voting access. Used Postman for comprehensive testing of all API routes and edge cases.

projects.name: Emergency Alert System for Children
projects.description: Developed a wearable safety device for children using ESP32 microcontroller and GPS/GSM modules. Implemented real-time location tracking and SOS feature with Firebase integration. Designed robust communication logic ensuring emergency alerts are delivered even in poor network conditions.
